00010 void Bruteforce::GenerateTerrain(GLuint textureId, std::string textureFilePath)
00011 {
00012         Mesh tempMesh;
00013         float colour;
00014         float texLeft, texBottom, texTop;
00015 
00016         for (int z = 0; z < m_heightfieldSize - 1; z++)
00017         {
00018                 for (int x = 0; x < m_heightfieldSize - 1; x++)
00019                 {
00020                         Vertex3 vertex;
00021 
00022                         float tex00 = (float)x / (m_heightfieldSize); // U
00023                         float tex01 = (float)z / (m_heightfieldSize); // V
00024                         float tex10 = (float)(x + 1) / (m_heightfieldSize);
00025                         float tex11 = (float)(z + 1) / (m_heightfieldSize);
00026 
00027                         // Colour of triangle
00028                         colour = (float)GetHeightColour(x, z) / 255;
00029                         vertex.m_colour = glm::vec4(colour, colour, colour, 1.0);
00030 
00031                         // Vertices
00032                         vertex.m_position.x = (float)x * m_scaleX;
00033                         vertex.m_position.y = GetHeight(x, z);
00034                         vertex.m_position.z = (float)z * m_scaleZ;
00035 
00036                         vertex.m_texCoords.x = tex00;
00037                         vertex.m_texCoords.y = tex11;
00038                         
00039                         tempMesh.GetVertices().push_back(vertex); // 0.0, 1.0, 0.0
00040 
00041                         vertex.m_position.x = (float)(x + 1) * m_scaleX;
00042                         vertex.m_position.y = GetHeight(x + 1, z);
00043                         vertex.m_position.z = (float)z * m_scaleZ;
00044 
00045                         vertex.m_texCoords.x = tex10;
00046                         vertex.m_texCoords.y = tex01;
00047 
00048                         tempMesh.GetVertices().push_back(vertex); // 1.0, 1.0, 0.0
00049 
00050                         vertex.m_position.x = (float)(x + 1) * m_scaleX;
00051                         vertex.m_position.y = GetHeight(x + 1, z + 1);
00052                         vertex.m_position.z = (float)(z + 1) * m_scaleZ;
00053 
00054                         vertex.m_texCoords.x = tex10;
00055                         vertex.m_texCoords.y = tex11;
00056 
00057                         tempMesh.GetVertices().push_back(vertex); // 1.0, 1.0, 1.0
00058                         
00059                         vertex.m_position.x = (float)x * m_scaleX;
00060                         vertex.m_position.y = GetHeight(x, z);
00061                         vertex.m_position.z = (float)z * m_scaleZ;
00062 
00063                         vertex.m_texCoords.x = tex00;
00064                         vertex.m_texCoords.y = tex01;
00065 
00066                         tempMesh.GetVertices().push_back(vertex); // 0.0, 1.0, 0.0
00067 
00068                         vertex.m_position.x = (float)(x + 1) * m_scaleX;
00069                         vertex.m_position.y = GetHeight(x + 1, z + 1);
00070                         vertex.m_position.z = (float)(z + 1) * m_scaleZ;
00071 
00072                         vertex.m_texCoords.x = tex10;
00073                         vertex.m_texCoords.y = tex11;
00074 
00075                         tempMesh.GetVertices().push_back(vertex); // 1.0, 1.0, 1.0
00076 
00077                         vertex.m_position.x = (float)x * m_scaleX;
00078                         vertex.m_position.y = GetHeight(x, z + 1);
00079                         vertex.m_position.z = (float)(z + 1) * m_scaleZ;
00080 
00081                         vertex.m_texCoords.x = tex00;
00082                         vertex.m_texCoords.y = tex11;
00083                         
00084                         tempMesh.GetVertices().push_back(vertex); // 0.0, 1.0, 1.0
00085                 }
00086         }
00087         //tempMesh.SetupMesh();
00088         tempMesh.GetTextures().push_back(AddTexture(textureId, textureFilePath));
00089         m_terrainModel->GetTextures().push_back(AddTexture(textureId, textureFilePath));
00090         m_terrainModel->GetMeshBatch().push_back(tempMesh);
00091         m_terrainModel->SetScale(glm::vec3(1.0, 1.0, 1.0));
00092 }

00094 Texture Bruteforce::AddTexture(GLuint textureId, std::string textureFilePath)
00095 {
00096         Texture temp;
00097 
00098         temp.m_id = textureId;
00099         temp.m_path = textureFilePath;
00100         temp.m_type = "texture_diffuse";
00101 
00102         return temp;
00103 }

00105 bool Bruteforce::LoadHeightfield(std::string fileName, const int size)
00106 {
00107         // Open for binary read, print error if error found
00108         std::ifstream infile(fileName.c_str(), std::ios::binary);
00109         if (!infile)
00110         {
00111                 std::cout << "Cannot open file: " << fileName << std::endl;
00112                 return false;
00113         }
00114 
00115         // Allocate memory, return false if no size = 0
00116         if (m_terrainData)
00117                 delete[] m_terrainData;
00118         if (size > 0)
00119                 m_terrainData = new unsigned char[size * size];
00120 
00121         // Read in heightfield and get length of file
00122         infile.seekg(0, std::ios::end);
00123         int length = infile.tellg();
00124 
00125         // Read data in as a block, cast to char*, set size, and close file
00126         infile.seekg(0, std::ios::beg);
00127         infile.read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(m_terrainData), length);
00128         infile.close();
00129         m_heightfieldSize = size;
00130         
00131         std::cout << "Heightfield Load Successful!" << std::endl;
00132         
00133         return true;
00134 }
00135 
00136 bool Bruteforce::Inbounds(int xpos, int zpos)
00137 {
00138         if ((xpos >= 0 && xpos < m_heightfieldSize * m_scaleX) && (zpos >= 0 && zpos < m_heightfieldSize * m_scaleZ))
00139                 return true;
00140         else
00141                 return false;
00142 }
00143 
00144 float Bruteforce::GetHeight(int xpos, int zpos)
00145 {
00146         if (Inbounds(xpos, zpos))
00147                 return ((float)(m_terrainData[(zpos * m_heightfieldSize) + xpos]) * m_scaleY);
00148         else
00149                 return ((float)(m_terrainData[(zpos - 1 * m_heightfieldSize) + xpos]) * m_scaleY);
00150 }
00151 
00152 unsigned char Bruteforce::GetHeightColour(int xpos, int zpos)
00153 {
00154         if (Inbounds(xpos, zpos))
00155         {
00156                 return m_terrainData[zpos * m_heightfieldSize + xpos];
00157         }
00158         return 1;
00159 }
00160 
00161 float Bruteforce::GetAverageHeight(int xpos, int zpos)
00162 {
00163         if (Inbounds(xpos, zpos))
00164         {
00165                 return (float)(m_terrainData[((int)(zpos / m_scaleZ) * m_heightfieldSize + (int)(xpos / m_scaleX))]) * m_scaleY;
00166         }
00167         return 1;
00168 }
